description: Palmolive Naturals Body Wash Sea Minerals with Seaweed & Sea Salt extracts is 95% natural origin. Gentle, cleansing gel with glycerin to leave skin feeling soft and nourished.We're here to make great skincare products without complexity or compromise.Our Palmolive Naturals Sea Minerals Body Wash with Seaweed & Sea Salt uses the best ingredients for healthy & beautiful skin.At Palmolive we're all about giving you more of what you love and less of what you don't.That's why this Shower Gel is made with 100% Natural Seaweed & Sea Salt extract. Breathe in this fresh ocean scent featuring orange, geranium, eucalyptus and rosemary oil.What we leave out is as important as what we put in.• No Parabens• No Phthalates• No Mineral Oil• No Alcohol• No Silicones• No Soap• No Animal Derivatives• No Gluten• No BPAThis product has been formulated with skin loving ingredients and is dermatologically tested and pH balanced to suit your skin.Please recycle us! This bottle is recyclable.Size: 500mL Body WashEnough for 100 washes.BODY WASH WITH NATURAL EXTRACTS: Palmolive Naturals Sea Minerals Body Wash is made with 100 percent Natural Seaweed and Sea SaltFORMULATED WITH SKIN LOVING INGREDIENTS: Our Palmolive Naturals Body Wash are made with skin loving ingredients which are dermatologically tested and pH Balanced to suit your skinMORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE AND LESS OF WHAT YOU DON'T: Palmolive Shower Gel are FREE from Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Alcohol, Silicones, Soap, Animal Derivatives, Gluten and BPAFRESH OCEAN SCENT: Breathe in this fresh ocean scent featuring orange, geranium, eucalyptus and rosemary oil.RECYCLABLE: Palmolive Naturals Body Wash are made with a recyclable bottle
name: Palmolive Naturals Body Wash Sea Minerals Shower Gel 500mL
